zh: 咨询过我的律师后，我会告诉你我的决定。

en: Americans are said to regard the amount of money a man makes as a criterion of his ability.
zh: 据说美国人把一个人挣钱的多少看作是衡量他能力的标准。

en: Friction between the Americans and the British mounted.
zh: 美国人和英国人之间的摩擦加剧了。

en: Steering wheels of American cars are on the left side.
zh: 美国汽车的方向盘在左边。

en: The steering wheels on American cars are on the left side.
zh: 美国汽车的方向盘在左边。

en: The United States of America is a democratic country.
zh: 美利坚合众国是一个民主国家。

en: The United States is a democracy.
zh: 美国是一个民主国家。

en: The United States is abundant in natural resources.
zh: 美国自然资源丰富。

en: The United States is typical of the democratic countries.
zh: 美国是民主国家的典型代表。

en: The affluence of the United States is often contrasted with the poverty of undeveloped countries.
zh: 美国的富裕经常与不发达国家的贫困形成对比。

en: The people of America fought for their independence.
zh: 美国人民为他们的独立而战。

en: Many American parents encourage their sons to play football to keep them away from drugs.
zh: 许多美国家长鼓励他们的儿子踢足球，以使他们远离毒品。

en: I have been corresponding with a pen pal in the USA for a year.
zh: 我和一位美国的笔友通信已经一年了。

en: Many races live together in the United States.
zh: 许多种族居住在美国。

en: They charge tax on liquor in the U.S.
zh: 他们在美国对酒类征税。

en: NASA says three of 22 space missions that carried generators similar to Galileo's ended in accidents.
zh: 美国国家航空航天局表示，在22次携带与伽利略号类似的发电机的太空任务中，有3次以事故告终。

en: Rice prices are regulated by the government.
zh: 大米价格由政府 регулируется。

en: Rice grows in warm countries.
zh: 大米生长在温暖的国家。

en: Rice grows in warm climates.
zh: 大米生长在温暖的气候中。

en: Rice is grown in many parts of the world.
zh: 世界许多地方都种植水稻。

en: Rice is one of those staple commodities.
zh: 大米是那些主要商品之一。

en: Rice will find a ready market there.
zh: 大米在那里会找到现成的市场。

en: Rice is sold by the kilogram.
zh: 大米是按公斤出售的。

en: Rice is the chief crop in this area.
zh: 大米是这个地区的主要作物。

en: The price of rice is going up again.
zh: 大米的价格又上涨了。

en: The price of rice has come down.
zh: 大米的价格已经下降了。

en: The price of rice rose by three percent.
zh: 大米的价格上涨了百分之三。

en: The price of rice went up three percent.
zh: 大米的价格上涨了百分之三。

en: Production of rice has decreased.
zh: 大米的产量下降了。

en: A poor rice harvest will get us into real trouble.
zh: 水稻歉收会给我们带来真正的麻烦。

en: The price of rice rose by more than three percent.
zh: 大米的价格上涨了百分之三以上。

en: The meeting was closed.
zh: 会议结束了。

en: A fly does not fly into a shut mouth.
zh: 祸从口出。

en: Wait in line, please.
zh: 请排队。

en: Don't speak out of line.
zh: 不要说出格的话。

en: We specialize in the import of machinery parts.
zh: 我们专门从事机械零件的进口。

en: Allow us to describe our products and our business operations.
zh: 请允许我们介绍我们的产品和业务运营。

en: Enclosed is our company profile.
zh: 随信附上我们的公司简介。

en: Our engineers compared this information with similar products being sold in Japan and concluded that they might compete very well.
zh: 我们的工程师将此信息与日本正在销售的类似产品进行了比较，并得出结论，它们可能很有竞争力。

en: I hope this letter interests you and look forward to your reply.
zh: 希望这封信能引起您的兴趣，并期待您的回复。

en: Thank you for your interest in our company.
zh: 感谢您对我们公司的关注。

en: She got her feet wet teaching while she was in the Peace Corps.
zh: 她在和平队工作期间开始尝试教书。

en: The peace talks begin this week.
zh: 和平谈判本周开始。

en: There is no one but desires peace.
zh: 没有人不渴望和平。

en: There is no one who doesn't desire peace.
zh: 没有人不渴望和平。

en: There is no man but desires peace.
zh: 没有人不渴望和平。

en: There are no people who don't desire peace.
zh: 没有人不渴望和平。

en: How much we still have to pay for peace is a riddle.
zh: 我们还要为和平付出多少代价，这仍然是个谜。

en: Nothing is as important as peace.
zh: 没有什么比和平更重要。

en: Peace will come to us in time.
zh: 和平终会到来。

en: Peace is of great importance.
zh: 和平至关重要。

en: The obverse of peace is war.
zh: 和平的反面是战争。

en: The opposite of peace is war.
zh: 和平的反面是战争。

en: Happy is a man who lives in peace and content.
zh: 生活在和平与满足中的人是幸福的。

en: They are moving from the peaceful hills and the countryside to the busy world of streets and crowds.
zh: 他们正从宁静的山丘和乡村搬到繁忙的街道和人群世界。

en: Who doesn't hope for peace and security?
zh: 谁不希望和平与安全？

en: There is no one but longs for peace and security.
zh: 没有人不渴望和平与安全。

en: They had a long talk in an atmosphere of peace and freedom.
zh: 他们在和平与自由的气氛中进行了长时间的交谈。

en: Nothing but peace can save the world.
zh: 只有和平才能拯救世界。

en: The waterways ramify across the plain.
zh: 水道在平原上纵横交错。

en: The waterways branch out across the plain.
zh: 水道在平原上分支延伸。

en: Mr Hirano is looked up to as an excellent engineer.
zh: 平野先生作为一名优秀的工程师，备受尊敬。

en: My temperature is normal.
zh: 我的体温正常。

en: You have to pay 10,000 yen extra on holidays.
zh: 节假日需要额外支付1万日元。

en: It seems less crowded during the week.
zh: 看来工作日人比较少。

en: Equality is guaranteed by the Constitution.
zh: 平等受宪法保障。

en: Thank you very much for patronizing our store for a long time.
zh: 非常感谢您长期以来对本店的惠顾。

en: You will lose your position if you don't keep your temper.
zh: 如果你控制不住脾气，你会失去你的职位。

en: Business as usual.
zh: 一切照常。

en: Mr Hirayama is a very good teacher.
zh: 平山先生是一位非常好的老师。

en: Mr. Hirayama is a very good teacher.
zh: 平山先生是一位非常好的老师。

en: Mr Hirayama teaches very well.
zh: 平山先生教得非常好。

en: Slide down the hill while distributing your weight equally on both skis.
zh: 滑下山坡时，将你的体重平均分配在两块滑雪板上。

en: The average length is seven hours and forty-five minutes, not much different from what a lot of humans need.
zh: 平均时长是七小时四十五分钟，和很多人类需要的睡眠时间差不多。

en: She is almost as intelligent as an average human child.
zh: 她几乎和普通人类儿童一样聪明。

en: Get yourself astride the balance beam.
zh: 让自己跨坐在平衡木上。

en: The average temperature has gone up.
zh: 平均气温上升了。

en: On an average how many miles do you walk a day?
zh: 平均每天你走多少英里？

en: On an average, I go to the movies twice a month.
zh: 平均来说，我一个月看两次电影。

en: I'm cool with that.
zh: 我没意见。

en: I can swim on my front but not on my back.
zh: 我能正面游泳，但不能仰泳。

en: Try to write in plain English.
zh: 尽量用简单的英语写作。

en: Written in plain English, this book is easy to read.
zh: 这本书用简单的英语写成，很容易阅读。

en: Written in plain English, the book is suitable for beginners.
zh: 这本书用简单的英语写成，适合初学者。

en: Written as it is in plain English, this book is useful to beginners.
zh: 这本书用简单的英语写成，对初学者很有用。

en: Flat land has no mountains or hills.
zh: 平坦的土地上没有山或丘陵。

en: Take the pan off the fire.
zh: 把锅从火上拿下来。

en: There was broken glass on top of the wall.
zh: 墙头上有碎玻璃。

en: The apples on the other side of the wall are the sweetest.
zh: 墙那边的苹果最甜。

en: Don't climb up the wall.
zh: 不要爬墙。

en: Don't throw a ball against the wall.
zh: 不要把球扔到墙上。

en: Hillary rested the ladder against the wall.
zh: 希拉里把梯子靠在墙上。

en: The soldiers were all supplied with a map of the place.
zh: 士兵们都配备了该地区的地图。

en: The soldier kept a sharp lookout in the darkness.
zh: 士兵在黑暗中保持着高度警惕。

en: The soldiers seized food from the people they conquered.
zh: 士兵从他们征服的人民那里抢夺食物。

en: Soldiers barred the way to the city.
zh: 士兵们封锁了通往城市的道路。

en: The soldiers were guarding the bridge.
zh: 士兵们在守卫桥梁。

en: The soldiers got to the foot of the hill before dawn.
zh: 士兵们在黎明前到达山脚下。

en: The soldiers have erected a peace monument.
zh: 士兵们竖立了一座和平纪念碑。

en: The soldiers lost the courage to fight.
zh: 士兵们失去了战斗的勇气。

en: The soldiers were on the alert.
zh: 士兵们保持警惕。

en: The soldiers headed for the frontier with caution.
zh: 士兵们谨慎地前往边境。

en: The troops refused to obey the command.
zh: 部队拒绝服从命令。

en: The soldiers narrowly escaped death.
zh: 士兵们险些丧命。

en: Soldiers must carry out their orders.
zh: 士兵必须执行他们的命令。

en: Soldiers bear arms.
zh: 士兵携带武器。

en: The soldiers advanced toward the town.
zh: 士兵们向城镇推进。

en: The soldiers were ordered to make an attack.
zh: 士兵们奉命发起进攻。

en: The soldier saved his friend at the cost of his own life.
zh: 士兵以自己的生命为代价救了他的朋友。

en: The soldier took shelter in the foxhole.
zh: 士兵在战壕里躲避。

en: The soldier groaned with pain.
zh: 士兵痛苦地呻吟着。

en: All the soldiers were gallant.
zh: 所有士兵都非常英勇。

en: The soldier aimed his gun at the man.
zh: 士兵用枪瞄准了那个人。

en: A soldier often has to confront danger.
zh: 士兵经常要面对危险。

en: The soldiers' food supply is running out.
zh: 士兵们的食物供应快要耗尽了。

en: The soldiers were making for the enemy camp.
zh: 士兵们正向敌军营地进发。

en: The soldiers were marking time.
zh: 士兵们在原地踏步。

en: The soldiers resisted the enemy attack.
zh: 士兵们抵抗了敌人的进攻。

en: The soldiers are ready for battle.
zh: 士兵们已经准备好战斗了。

en: The soldiers retreated from their positions.
zh: 士兵们从他们的阵地撤退了。

en: The soldiers were ready to die for their country.
zh: 士兵们准备为他们的国家牺牲。

en: The soldiers ached for their homeland.
zh: 士兵们渴望他们的家园。

en: The soldiers were marching with their swords shining.
zh: 士兵们迈着步伐前进，他们的剑闪闪发光。

en: The soldiers were told never to surrender.
zh: 士兵们被告知永远不要投降。

en: The soldiers proceeded to the frontier with caution.
zh: 士兵们谨慎地前往边境。

en: Soldiers are used to danger.
zh: 士兵们习惯了危险。

en: The soldiers were animated by the song.
zh: 士兵们被这首歌所鼓舞。

en: The soldiers' mission was to destroy the bridge.
zh: 士兵们的任务是摧毁桥梁。

en: All the soldiers stood side by side.
zh: 所有士兵肩并肩站在一起。

en: I have got into Hyogo University.
zh: 我考入了兵库大学。

en: I go to Hyogo University.
zh: 我在兵库大学上学。

en: What is the population of Hyogo prefecture?
zh: 兵库县的人口是多少？

en: The only sound to be heard was the ticking of the clock.
zh: 唯一能听到的声音是钟表的滴答声。

en: Talk louder so that I may hear you.
zh: 大声点说，这样我才能听见你。

en: I can't hear you.
zh: 我听不见你。

en: Can you hear me?
zh: 你能听见我吗？

en: Do you read me?
zh: 你听得到我说话吗？

en: I can't hear it.
zh: 我听不见。

en: The more I hear, the more interesting it becomes.
zh: 我听得越多，就越觉得有意思。

en: I hear he is somebody in his village.
zh: 我听说他在他们村里是个大人物。

en: Hear and see and be still.
zh: 听着，看着，保持安静。

en: Nothing is lost for asking.
zh: 问问又没什么损失。

en: I'm all ears.
zh: 我洗耳恭听。

en: Want to know?
zh: 想知道吗？

en: I need to hear it.
zh: 我需要听听。

en: I am tired of hearing that.
zh: 我听腻了。

en: Don't ask.
zh: 别问了。

en: Please don't ask.
zh: 请别问。

en: Heard melodies are sweet, but those unheard are sweeter.
zh: 听到的旋律固然美妙，但未听到的旋律更甜美。

en: Do you hear me?
zh: 你听得到我吗？

en: Are you listening?
zh: 你在听吗？

en: You know what?
zh: 你知道吗？

en: In case you haven't noticed, I've been waiting for two hours.
zh: 如果你还没注意到，我已经等了两个小时了。

en: Listen to this!
zh: 听听这个！

en: Don't believe everything you hear.
zh: 不要相信你听到的一切。

en: From what I've heard, their marriage is on the rocks.
zh: 据我所知，他们的婚姻岌岌可危。

en: According to what I heard, he went over to America to study biology.
zh: 据我所知，他去美国学习生物学了。

en: Nobody had ever heard of it.
zh: 以前从来没有人听说过。

en: Scratch a Russian and find a Tartar.
zh: 剥开一个俄罗斯人，你会发现一个鞑靼人。

en: Civilization is now threatened by nuclear war.
zh: 现在文明正受到核战争的威胁。

en: The progress of civilization is very rapid.
zh: 文明的进步非常迅速。

en: The more civilization advances, the more people long for nature.
zh: 文明越进步，人们越向往自然。

en: As civilization advances, poetry almost necessarily declines.
zh: 随着文明的进步，诗歌几乎必然衰落。

en: I don't have any money.
zh: 我身无分文。

en: You should try to produce grammatical sentences.
zh: 你应该尽量写出符合语法的句子。

en: Grammar, which I hate, is good for me.
zh: 语法，我讨厌它，但它对我有好处。

en: Although I really hate grammar, it's useful.
zh: 虽然我真的很讨厌语法，但它很有用。

en: I got the grammar lesson without difficulty.
zh: 我不费吹灰之力就理解了语法课。

en: There are grammatical principles involved.
zh: 这里面涉及到语法原则。

en: The basic principles of grammar are not so difficult.
zh: 语法的基本原则并不难。

en: Your composition is correct, as far as grammar is concerned.
zh: 就语法而言，你的作文是正确的。

en: Grammar be hanged.
zh: 管他什么语法。

en: Everyone likes Fumio because he is honest.
zh: 大家都喜欢文雄，因为他很诚实。

en: Style is to the writer what color is to the painter.
zh: 风格之于作家，犹如色彩之于画家。

en: You must begin a sentence with a capital letter.
zh: 你必须用大写字母开始一个句子。

en: Literature flourishes best when it is half a trade and half an art.
zh: 文学在半是商业半是艺术的时候发展得最好。

en: Written words, carrier pigeons, the telegraph, and many other devices carried ideas faster and faster from man to man.
zh: 文字、信鸽、电报和许多其他工具，使人们传递思想的速度越来越快。

en: Complaining won't change anything.
zh: 抱怨不会改变任何事情。

en: Stop complaining and do as you're told.
zh: 别抱怨了，照我说的做。

en: Don't complain. You have to go.
zh: 别抱怨了。你必须去。

en: Don't complain.
zh: 别抱怨了。

en: Don't complain about that. You've asked for it.
zh: 别抱怨了。这是你自找的。

en: Will you please use indelible ink so the phrase won't rub out?
zh: 请你用不褪色的墨水，这样字句就不会被擦掉？

en: If you have a complaint let me hear it. There's a difference between superficial obedience and honest loyalty you know.
zh: 如果你有什么不满就说出来。你知道，表面上的服从和真正的忠诚是有区别的。

en: Reading literary criticism is very helpful to understanding literature.
zh: 阅读文学评论对理解文学很有帮助。

en: From a literary point of view, his work is a failure.
zh: 从文学的角度来看，他的作品是失败的。

en: Reading of literature nourishes the mind.
zh: 阅读文学作品可以滋养心灵。

en: Literature teaches us about humanity.
zh: 文学教导我们关于人性的知识。

en: Literature reflects human activity as carried on by the best minds.
zh: 文学反映了最优秀的人们所从事的人类活动。

en: I will lecture on literature.
zh: 我将讲授文学。

en: The trade of critic, in literature, music, and the drama, is the most degraded of all.
zh: 在文学、音乐和戏剧领域，评论家的职业是最堕落的。

en: Our school festival was held last month.
zh: 我们学校的文化节是上个月举办的。

en: A cultural heritage is handed down to posterity.
zh: 文化遗产被传承给后代。

en: We have to consider the problem in the light of cultural differences.
zh: 我们必须根据文化差异来考虑这个问题。

en: Culture is handed down from generation to generation.
zh: 文化代代相传。

en: Countries differ in culture.
zh: 各国文化不同。

en: Culture destroys language.
zh: 文化会摧毁语言。

en: Culture destroys languages.
zh: 文化会摧毁语言。

en: Sentences begin with a capital letter.
zh: 句子以大写字母开头。

en: The style is the man himself.
zh: 文如其人。

en: Get the meaning of a word from its context.
zh: 从上下文中理解一个词的含义。

en: A capital letter is used at the beginning of a sentence.
zh: 句子开头使用大写字母。

en: The first word of every sentence should be capitalized.
zh: 每个句子的第一个单词应该大写。

en: A sentence normally has a subject and a verb.
zh: 一个句子通常有一个主语和一个谓语。

en: The atmosphere can become rather strained.
zh: 气氛可能会变得相当紧张。

en: The atmosphere was uncomfortable.
zh: 气氛令人不舒服。

en: There can be no human society without conflict.
zh: 没有冲突就没有人类社会。

en: The bronze statue was broken into pieces.
zh: 那尊青铜雕像被打成了碎片。

en: Mix the flour with two eggs.
zh: 将面粉和两个鸡蛋混合。

en: A man of prudence wouldn't say such things.
zh: 一个谨慎的人不会说这样的话。

en: A sensible man wouldn't say such a thing in public.
zh: 一个明智的人不会在公共场合说这样的话。

en: A man of sense would be ashamed to do so.
zh: 一个有理智的人会羞于这样做。

en: A sensible person is one who uses good sense.
zh: 明智的人是善于运用理智的人。

en: Try to live within your income.
zh: 尽量量入为出。

en: You should try to live within your income.
zh: 你应该尽量量入为出。

en: Cut your coat according to your cloth.
zh: 量体裁衣。

en: In my analysis I rely considerably on the types of authoritarian behaviour first analyzed by Kurz.
zh: 在我的分析中，我很大程度上依赖于库尔茨首先分析的专制行为类型。

en: Based on my observation of the movement of particle D, I modify the system so that three possible exits exist.
zh: 根据我对粒子D运动的观察，我修改了系统，使其存在三个可能的出口。

en: Can I buy it on easy payment?
zh: 我可以分期付款购买吗？

en: We'd like to split it. Could you bring it to us on two plates?
zh: 我们想分开吃。你能用两个盘子给我们端上来吗？

en: I think I understand.
zh: 我想我明白了。

en: I have the feeling that I understand.
zh: 我感觉我明白了。

en: We will contact you as soon as we know.
zh: 一旦我们知道，我们会尽快联系你。

en: He nodded when I asked if he understood.
zh: 当我问他是否明白时，他点了点头。

en: Do you follow?
zh: 你明白了吗？

en: Do you understand?
zh: 你明白吗？

en: Can you answer this?
zh: 你能回答这个问题吗？

en: Okay. Drive safely.
zh: 好的。开车小心。

en: Mark the words that you cannot understand.
zh: 标记出你不理解的单词。

en: Mark the words which you cannot understand.
zh: 标记出你不理解的单词。

en: Ask me whenever you're in doubt.
zh: 有疑问随时问我。

en: I know but I can't help it.
zh: 我知道，但我控制不住。

en: You see? You must study a foreign language.
zh: 看到了吗？你必须学习一门外语。

en: You see?
zh: 看到了吗？

en: You understand, don't you?
zh: 你明白了吧？

en: Students who want to major in physics ought to have a sufficient knowledge of mathematics.
zh: 想主修物理学的学生应该具备足够的数学知识。

en: Physics can be defined as the science of matter, motion, and energy.
zh: 物理学可以定义为研究物质、运动和能量的科学。

en: Physics is a fundamental natural science.
zh: 物理学是一门基础自然科学。

en: Physics is not easy to learn.
zh: 物理学不容易学。

en: Which do you like better, physics or chemistry?
zh: 你更喜欢物理还是化学？

en: Physics is my favorite subject.
zh: 物理是我最喜欢的科目。

en: Physics is my weak subject.
zh: 物理是我的弱项。

en: Physics be hanged!
zh: 管他什么物理！

en: I have become forgetful.
zh: 我变得健忘了。

en: I've become forgetful.
zh: 我变得健忘了。

en: I forgot to lock the storeroom.
zh: 我忘了锁储藏室。

en: Matter can exist as a solid, liquid, or gas.
zh: 物质可以以固态、液态或气态存在。

en: It's the most beautiful night I've seen since I can remember.
zh: 这是我记忆中最美丽的夜晚。

en: Material standards of living were never higher.
zh: 物质生活水平从未如此之高。

en: Matter changes its form according to temperature.
zh: 物质根据温度改变其形态。

en: The process by which substances are turned directly from a solid state into a gas is called sublimation.
zh: 物质直接从固态转化为气态的过程称为升华。

en: When matter is changed chemically, chemical energy is given off.
zh: 当物质发生化学变化时，会释放化学能。

en: We can hardly settle things by theory alone.
zh: 我们很难仅凭理论来解决问题。

en: One may as well not know a thing at all, as know it but imperfectly.
zh: 与其一知半解，不如一无所知。

en: It's very difficult to put things in order.
zh: 把事情整理好非常困难。

en: You should try to see things from the practical point of view.
zh: 你应该试着从实际的角度来看问题。

en: Try to do things for yourself.
zh: 试着自己做事。

en: In doing things, we cannot be too careful.
zh: 在做事时，我们再小心也不为过。

en: I'm the type who likes to think things over very carefully.
zh: 我是那种喜欢仔细考虑事情的人。

en: Don't do things by halves.
zh: 不要半途而废。

en: Take things as they are.
zh: 顺其自然。

en: Don't leave things half done.
zh: 不要半途而废。

en: Don't leave things half finished.
zh: 不要半途而废。

en: Never do things by halves.
zh: 做事不要半途而废。

en: It never rains but it pours.
zh: 不鸣则已，一鸣惊人。

en: See things as they are.
zh: 实事求是。

en: Look at the sunny side of things.
zh: 往好处看。

en: Look on the bright side of things.
zh: 往好处看。

en: One must draw the line somewhere.
zh: 凡事总要有个限度。

en: I don't like a world where things change so slowly.
zh: 我不喜欢一个变化如此缓慢的世界。

en: Goods are the great travelers over the earth's surface, far more than humans, which means that hardly an inhabited spot on the globe is untouched by trade.
zh: 货物是地球表面上伟大的旅行者，远胜于人类，这意味着地球上几乎没有一个有人居住的地方没有受到贸易的影响。

en: His bearing announced him as a military man.
zh: 他的举止表明他是个军人。

en: The story drew to a conclusion.
zh: 故事接近尾声。

en: The story got more and more interesting.
zh: 故事越来越有趣。

en: The story got more and more exciting.
zh: 故事越来越精彩。

en: How about the last part of the story?
zh: 故事的最后一部分怎么样？

en: The action of the story takes place on an island.
zh: 故事的发生地在一个岛上。

en: My poor dumb friend died this morning.
zh: 我可怜的傻朋友今天早上去世了。

en: He knows most who speaks least.
zh: 知者不言，言者不知。

en: The price index hit an all-time high.
zh: 物价指数创历史新高。

en: A committee was constituted to investigate prices.
zh: 成立了一个委员会来调查物价。

en: Several factors operated to help prices go up.
zh: 有几个因素共同作用导致物价上涨。

en: Prices have soared every year.
zh: 物价每年都在飙升。

en: Prices are going up every day.
zh: 物价每天都在上涨。

en: Prices are on the upward trend.
zh: 物价呈上涨趋势。

en: Prices continued to rise.
zh: 物价持续上涨。

en: Commodity prices were rising.
zh: 商品价格在上涨。

en: Prices go on rising.
zh: 价格持续上涨。

en: Prices showed a tendency of going up.
zh: 价格呈现上涨的趋势。

en: Prices will continue to go up.
zh: 价格将继续上涨。

en: Prices will continue to rise.
zh: 价格将继续上涨。

en: One in four consumers thinks that prices will continue to rise in the future.
zh: 四分之一的消费者认为未来价格将继续上涨。

en: Prices will continue as they are.
zh: 价格将保持不变。

en: Far from falling, the prices of commodities went on rising.
zh: 商品价格非但没有下降，反而持续上涨。

en: Prices will rise in course of time.
zh: 价格会随着时间的推移而上涨。

en: Prices ought to come down soon.
zh: 价格应该很快会下降。

en: Prices have climbed higher than Mount McKinley.
zh: 价格已经涨得比麦金利山还高了。

en: Prices are still on the rise.
zh: 价格还在上涨。

en: The prices are going up higher and higher.
zh: 价格越来越高。

en: Prices have been rising steadily.
zh: 价格一直在稳步上涨。

en: Prices have risen steadily during the past decade.
zh: 过去十年，价格一直在稳步上涨。

en: Prices are double what they were two years ago.
zh: 现在的价格是两年前的两倍。

en: Prices are double what they were ten years ago.
zh: 现在的价格是十年前的两倍。

en: Rising costs are fueling anxieties among consumers.
zh: 不断上涨的成本加剧了消费者的焦虑。

en: The rise in prices is pressing our family budget.
zh: 物价上涨给我们的家庭预算带来了压力。

en: Prices dropped suddenly.
zh: 价格突然下跌。

en: Prices keep on soaring.
zh: 价格持续飙升。

en: Prices are rising.
zh: 价格正在上涨。

en: Prices are going up.
zh: 价格正在上涨。

en: It is certain that prices will go up.
zh: 价格肯定会上涨。

en: The price rose.
zh: 价格上涨了。
